text: won’t install for me unfortunately due to Compat compat

text:
```ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package Compat [34da2185]:
 Compat [34da2185] log:
 ├─possible versions are: 1.0.0-3.25.0 or uninstalled
 ├─restricted by compatibility requirements with TerminalMenus [dc548174] to versions: 1.0.0-2.2.1
 │ └─TerminalMenus [dc548174] log:
 │   ├─possible versions are: 0.1.0 or uninstalled
 │   └─restricted to versions * by PkgCleanup [f3e62ec7], leaving only versions 0.1.0
 │     └─PkgCleanup [f3e62ec7] log:
 │       ├─possible versions are: 0.1.0 or uninstalled
 │       └─PkgCleanup [f3e62ec7] is fixed to version 0.1.0
 └─restricted by compatibility requirements with DataStructures [864edb3b] to versions: 3.0.0-3.25.0 — no versions left
   └─DataStructures [864edb3b] log:
     ├─possible versions are: 0.9.0-0.18.9 or uninstalled
     └─restricted to versions 0.18 by NeutralLandscapes [71847384], leaving only versions 0.18.0-0.18.9```
